content: Hi, I'm working on my first contribution to rust-lang/rust-clippy. I'm beginning to implement this issue: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust-clippy/issues/1974. My fix causes the clippy output for several of the ui tests to change, causing cargo test to fail. After looking at the Contributing documentation, I ran cargo dev bless but to no avail. What am I missing?
Did you read https://github.com/rust-lang/rust-clippy/blob/master/doc/basics.md#building-and-testing? Maybe that can help
